resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: The Mount Fuji is the highest Japanese mountain with an altitude of 3776 meters. It is located in the middle of Japan near Tokyo. This sacred mountain inspired Hokusai for his thirty-six Views of Mount Fuji prints.
resource.chars: The Mount Fuji is the highest Japanese mountain with an altitude of 3776 meters. It is located in the middle of Japan near Tokyo. This sacred mountain inspired Hokusai for his thirty-six Views of Mount Fuji prints.
